name: UIMenu
desc: A container for grouping related menu elements in an app menu or contextual menu.

items.name: init(title: String, image: UIImage?, identifier: UIMenu.Identifier?, options: UIMenu.Options, children: [UIMenuElement])
items.desc: Creates a new menu with the specified values.

items.name: struct UIMenu.Identifier
items.desc: Constants for identifying an app's standard menus.

items.name: struct UIMenu.Options
items.desc: Options for configuring a menu's appearance.

items.name: func replacingChildren([UIMenuElement]) -> UIMenu
items.desc: Creates a new menu with the same configuration as the current menu, but with a new set of child elements.

items.name: var identifier: UIMenu.Identifier
items.desc: The unique identifier for the current menu.

items.name: var options: UIMenu.Options
items.desc: The configuration options for the current menu.
